docs.snippet: Joe Paterno's relatives are attempting to rewrite history and ignore reality as they seek to overturn a $60 million fine and other NCAA sanctions against Penn State due to the Jerry Sandusky child sex-abuse scandal, NCAA attorneys said in asking a...
docs.lead_paragraph: Joe Paterno's relatives are attempting to rewrite history and ignore reality as they seek to overturn a $60 million fine and other NCAA sanctions against Penn State due to the Jerry Sandusky child sex-abuse scandal, NCAA attorneys said in asking a judge to dismiss a lawsuit filed by the late Penn State football coach's family.

headline.main: NCAA: Paterno Sanctions Lawsuit Rewrites History
headline.print_headline: NCAA: Paterno Sanctions Lawsuit Rewrites History

docs.snippet: A tight schedule, with six games in nine days, came about largely because Madison Square Garden and the Penguins’ arena were booked for other teams, concerts and a university commencement ceremony....
docs.lead_paragraph: A tight schedule, with six games in nine days, came about largely because Madison Square Garden and the Penguins’ arena were booked for other teams, concerts and a university commencement ceremony.
docs.abstract: New York Rangers have had tight playoff schedule against the Pittsburgh Penguins, playing six games in nine days, largely because Madison Square Garden and the Penguins' home arena were booked for other teams and events.

headline.main: Busy Arenas Keep Rangers on the Move
